title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Trends in Information Literacy Research: Data-Driven PBL Pro

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can derive key keywords from domestic and international information literacy research using keyword network analysis tools
A systematic literature search strategy can be established in academic databases (Scopus, KCI) to analyze research trends
Evaluation and collaborative strategies for improving information literacy education can be proposed through mathematical modeling
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
